name: Aerial Boomerang
summary: A blade of shearing wind races away from you in a 60-foot line.

name: Air Cushion
summary: Air currents flow upward to slow the target's fall to 60 feet per round.

name: Armor in Earth
summary: Stone encases you like armor.

name: Burning Jet
summary: A condensed burst of flame shoots behind you, propelling you forward with its sheer force.

name: Deflecting Wave
summary: A cascade of water blunts or disperses the incoming attack.

name: Elemental Familiar (Kineticist)
summary: A small creature made of elemental matter springs forth from your kinetic gate.

name: Eternal Torch
trait: Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Light, Manipulate, Primal
summary: You open a connection to your kinetic gate, large enough for a torch flame to flow.

name: Extended Kinesis
summary: You've refined the control you can exert over your elements.

name: Flash Forge
summary: An artificial metal object forms in the hands of you or a willing ally within 30 feet.

name: Flying Flame
summary: A Tiny shape of flame appears, taking a form of your choice— such as a bird, an arrow, or a simple sphere.

name: Four Winds
summary: Mimicking the anemoi—monarchs of the four winds—you propel four creatures.

name: Fresh Produce
trait: Healing, Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Vitality, Wood
summary: You grow a nourishing nut, vegetable, seed, or fruit.

name: Geologic Attunement
summary: You tune to the earth and stone around you, extending your senses through it in rippling waves.

name: Hail of Splinters
summary: A fusillade of jagged splinters flies from you.

name: Hardwood Armor
summary: Wood and bark grow over your body like armor.

name: Magnetic Pinions
summary: Small pieces of metal fly from you, propelled with magnetism at great velocity.

name: Metal Carapace
summary: Sheets of bent and rusted metal cover you in an armored shell.

name: Ocean's Balm
trait: Healing, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Primal, Vitality, Water
summary: A blessing of the living sea salves wounds and douses flames.

name: Scorching Column
summary: With an upward gesture, you shape a vertical column of extreme heat.

name: Shard Strike
summary: Jagged metal shards form in the air and lash out from you.

name: Stepping Stones
summary: Disks of rock fly to points that you designate to make a new path.

name: Tidal Hands
summary: With an emphatic gesture, you create waves that rush out from you in the shape of your hands.

name: Timber Sentinel
summary: A slim, symmetrical tree travels from the Plane of Wood.

name: Tremor
summary: You unleash a small, localized tremor in a 10-foot burst within 30 feet.

name: Versatile Blasts
summary: Accessing a wider realm of elemental manifestations, you can make blasts with rare forms of your elements.

name: Weapon Infusion
summary: With a signature flair, you shape blasts of elemental power into the form of a weapon, such as a sword made of whirling wind or a bow that shoots flames.

name: Whisper on the Wind
trait: Air, Auditory, Illusion, Impulse, Kineticist, Linguistic, Primal
summary: You speak in a whisper, a soft wind carrying your words far away.

name: Winter's Clutch
summary: Gleaming flakes of chilling snow fall in a 10-foot burst within 60 feet.

name: Kinetic Activation
summary: Rather than incantations and gestures, you can use your kinetic gate to directly unlock the potential of elementally empowered magic items.

name: Voice of the Elements
summary: You can speak with the secret tones of elements you channel, finding words in the crackle of flame, the grinding of stone.

name: Air Shroud
summary: Turbulent air suffuses your kinetic aura.

name: Ambush Bladderwort
trait: Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Water, Wood
summary: You plant the seed of a giant bladderwort in an unoccupied square of ground or water within 30 feet.

name: Blazing Wave
summary: Flames flow out of you in a cascade, engulfing everyone in a 30-foot cone.

name: Calcifying Sand
trait: Earth, Impulse, Incapacitation, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal
summary: Your flesh gives way as you're struck, becoming coarse sand that can magically turn your enemy to stone.

name: Command Elemental
summary: You grasp the animating force within an elemental creature and bend it to your will.

name: Igneogenesis
summary: You can create a permanent stone object, either sculpting stone pulled directly from your kinetic gate or manipulating earth and stone around you.

name: Lava Leap
trait: Composite, Earth, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal
summary: You wreath yourself in molten stone and hurtle toward your enemy.

name: Lightning Dash
trait: Air, Electricity, Impulse, Kineticist, Move, Overflow, Polymorph, Primal
summary: For an instant, you transform yourself into a being of pure lightning and fly forward, shocking anyone in your way.

name: Living Bonfire
trait: Composite, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Wood
summary: Roots and branches of living wood writhe in elemental fire at your command, forming a bonfire fearsome enough to scare off predators in the night.

name: Magnetic Field
summary: A magnetic field surrounds you.

name: Plate in Treasure
summary: Precious metal flows from your fingers to plate an object.

name: Rain of Rust
trait: Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Metal, Primal, Water
summary: You conjure a red raincloud in a 10-foot burst within 60 feet, which pours rust-colored rain directly below it.

name: Ravel of Thorns
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Stance, Wood
summary: Thorny vines grow in geometric patterns on surfaces in your kinetic aura.

name: Return to the Sea
summary: You adapt a creature to living and moving in water.

name: Safe Elements
summary: Elements are wild and dangerous, but you've found ways to reduce their risk.

name: Thermal Nimbus
summary: You direct waves of warmth into or out of your kinetic gate to drastically shift the temperature around you.

name: Tumbling Lumber
summary: A slew of logs eject from the Plane of Wood and slam into your enemies.

name: Whirling Grindstone
trait: Attack, Composite, Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Metal, Primal
summary: A whirling grindstone made of flint appears in an unoccupied square within 30 feet.

name: Winter Sleet
trait: Cold, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Stance, Water
summary: Bone-chilling, swirling sleet surrounds you, cruel as deepest winter.

name: Ash Strider
trait: Air, Composite, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Polymorph, Primal
summary: You discorporate into a cloud of whirling ash and Stride.

name: Clear as Air
trait: Air, Illusion, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal
summary: Compact layers of air diffract and bend light around your body, making you appear as clear as the sky on a perfect day.

name: Consume Power
summary: You absorb energy and hold it in your kinetic gate.

name: Counter Element
summary: Your absolute dedication to a single element lets you attempt to gain control over it, even when the element is in service to another entity.

name: Crawling Fire
summary: You mimic the motions of a beast of your devising, and it becomes real, with a flaming pelt and searing claws.

name: Dash of Herbs
trait: Healing, Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Vitality, Wood
summary: A small cloud of medicinal herbs heal a creature.

name: Desert Wind
trait: Air, Composite, Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Stance
summary: A vortex of sand and dust surrounds you.

name: Driving Rain
summary: Heavy drops of rain batter down, hitting like sling stones and impeding vision.

name: Elemental Artillery
trait: Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Metal, Primal, Wood
summary: Spinning wood and metal together, you create a rugged wooden ballista.

name: Fearsome Familiar
summary: Your elemental familiar trades places with an elemental from its elemental plane.

name: Flinging Updraft
summary: A speeding wind heeds your call, picking someone up and depositing them nearby.

name: Jagged Berms
trait: Composite, Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Wood
summary: You conjure up to six cube-shaped mounds of packed earth.

name: Lightning Rod
trait: Air, Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Metal, Primal
summary: You smash a metal rod into your foe and call lightning to it.

name: Molten Wire
trait: Composite, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Metal, Primal
summary: Spinning molten iron through a vortex of fire, you trap your foe in searing wires.

name: Rising Hurricane
trait: Air, Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Water
summary: A hurricane lifts your enemies into the air before bringing them crashing down in a bloody rain.

name: Roiling Mudslide
trait: Composite, Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Water
summary: You form water and earth into a mudslide that smashes your opponents and coats them in mud.

name: Sand Snatcher
summary: A figure of sand with grasping arms arises in an unoccupied square within 30 feet.

name: Scrap Barricade
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Metal, Overflow, Primal
summary: Ragged pieces of metal weld together into a ramshackle structure.

name: Steam Knight
trait: Composite, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Stance, Water
summary: You shape your kinetic aura into swirling armor of steam that scalds your enemies and propels you on super-heated jet streams.

name: Torrent in the Blood
trait: Healing, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal, Vitality, Water
summary: A healing wave splashes across creatures in a 30-foot cone, its cleansing water driving afflictions from the body.

name: Tree of Duality
trait: Air, Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Wood
summary: An ephemeral tree bursts forth, floating on air in an unoccupied square of your choice within 60 feet.

name: Two-Element Infusion
summary: Slamming one element into another, you combine their strengths.

name: Volcanic Escape
summary: Lava reflexively explodes underneath you and the creature that hurt you.

name: Weight of Stone
summary: A packed cloud of thundering boulders descends from the sky, beating down everyone in its path.

name: Wooden Palisade
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal, Wood
summary: Planks of wood, embellished with carvings, spring forth to form a wall.

name: Call the Hurricane
summary: Massive waves spiral around you, with you as the eye of the hurricane.

name: Conductive Sphere
trait: Electricity, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Metal, Primal
summary: A floating metal ball forms in a space within 30 feet, flashing with electricity.

name: Cyclonic Ascent
summary: Whorls of wind surround your lower body, forming a cyclone that lifts you into the air.

name: Drifting Pollen
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Stance, Wood
summary: A haze of pollen floats around you.

name: Elemental Overlap
summary: Though you've dedicated yourself to one element, you learn to mix that element with another.

name: Impenetrable Fog
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal, Water
summary: Fog condenses in a chaotic, swirling pattern, thick enough that it seems to push back against you.

name: Kindle Inner Flames
summary: As a candle can light another, you awaken the latent potential to channel fire in other creatures.

name: Purify Element
summary: You turn an element into its purest form.

name: Retch Rust
summary: You exhale tendrils formed from flakes of rusted metal.

name: Sanguivolent Roots
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Plant, Primal, Wood
summary: Blood-drinking vines grow from the ground in a 15-foot burst within 120 feet.

name: Solar Detonation
trait: Fire, Impulse, Incapacitation, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Vitality
summary: Blinding flames explode in a swirling sphere! The detonation fills a 20-foot burst within 60 feet of you.

name: Spike Skin
summary: You touch a willing creature, causing its skin to harden and form spiky protrusions.

name: Storm Spiral
trait: Air, Electricity, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Sonic
summary: Dark thunderclouds swirl in a miniature storm, crisscrossed with lightning bolts; a tremendous thunderclap fills the air.

name: Swim Through Earth
summary: The earth parts before you, letting you swim through it.

name: Aura Shaping
summary: You control the size of your kinetic aura.

name: Chain Infusion
summary: The elemental matter in your blast keeps reconstituting itself to travel onward, no matter how many bodies it collides with.

name: Elemental Transformation
summary: You open your kinetic gate, but rather than activating your kinetic aura, you instead become overwhelmed with transformative elemental energy.

name: Architect of Flame
trait: Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal
summary: Flames rise and shape to your will, forming a wall or dome of your design.

name: Effortless Impulse
summary: A steady ripple from your kinetic gate maintains one of your impulses.

name: Furnace Form
trait: Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Polymorph, Primal
summary: Opening your kinetic gate, you allow flames to consume your form and leave you a living flame.

name: Ghosts in the Storm
trait: Air, Electricity, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Stance
summary: Clouds, like eager pets, are drawn to you and to those in your good graces.

name: Glacial Prison
trait: Cold, Impulse, Incapacitation, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Water
summary: Intense cold swirls around your foe, covering it in frost that slows it down and turns its body to ice.

name: Hedge Maze
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Plant, Primal, Wood
summary: You sculpt a manicured maze of hedges.

name: Rain of Razors
summary: Razor-sharp slivers of metal fall from the sky.

name: Rattle The Earth
summary: Striking the ground with the gravity of the deepest rocks, you cause an earthquake.

name: Rock Rampart
trait: Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal
summary: Drawing on your connection to the Plane of Earth, you form a wall of rock and earth.

name: Sea Glass Guardians
summary: Eerily beautiful elemental water beings race around you, eager to protect and heal you and your allies.

name: Shattershields
summary: Four plates of pitted metal float around you to intercept attacks.

name: Wiles on the Wind
trait: Air, Auditory, Illusion, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal
summary: Speaking lies, you set them loose upon a drifting wind.

name: Witchwood Seed
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Plant, Polymorph, Primal, Wood
summary: You touch a creature to implant a malignant seed in its body.

name: Alloy Flesh and Steel
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Metal, Polymorph, Primal
summary: Elemental energy replaces every cell of your body with raw metal.

name: Assume Earth's Mantle
summary: Enormous pieces of rock cluster around your body.

name: Barrier of Boreal Frost
trait: Cold, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal, Water
summary: You form an intricate structure of ice, such as a wall of bricks made of packed snow or a screen of enormous icicles.

name: Body of Air
trait: Air, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Polymorph, Primal
summary: Your gathered air consumes your body, leaving only a cloud of living vapor.

name: Nourishing Gate
summary: You can sustain yourself on a single drop of elemental dew or the slightest spark from the Plane of Fire.

name: Orchard's Endurance
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Stance, Wood
summary: Patches of bark appear on the skin of you and your nearby allies.

name: Rapid Reattunement
summary: You spend 10 minutes realigning your elemental connections in an elemental trance.

name: Walk Through the Conflagration
trait: Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Teleportation
summary: You fall through your own kinetic gate, leaving behind an effigy of flame and reappearing majestically near another fire.

name: Imperious Aura
prerequisite: one or more stance impulses that affect your kinetic aura
summary: Your glowing and majestic kinetic aura marks you as a true child of the elements.

name: All Shall End in Flames
trait: Death, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal
summary: White-hot fire consumes everything in a cataclysmic sphere of death.

name: Beasts of Slumbering Steel
summary: You conjure metal elemental mounts made of interlocking metal pieces.

name: Crowned in Tempest's Fury
trait: Air, Electricity, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Stance
summary: You become one with a devastating thunderstorm from the Plane of Air, placing a crown of lightning upon your brow.

name: Elemental Apotheosis
summary: You take on an elemental countenance, appearing like a type of elemental of your element.

name: Hell of 1,000,000 Needles
summary: The landscape fills with monumental filaments of metal.

name: Ignite the Sun
summary: The fires of creation become yours to control.

name: Infinite Expanse of Bluest Heaven
trait: Air, Illusion, Impulse, Kineticist, Mental, Overflow, Primal, Visual
summary: An illusion of a limitless expanse with an impossibly blue sky makes all within feel the sensation of falling...

name: Rebirth in Living Stone
trait: Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Polymorph, Primal, Stance
summary: Rock overflows from within you to consume your form before cracking open to reveal your body transformed into living stone.

name: Ride the Tsunami
summary: Booming, crashing walls of water, enough to fill a harbor, smash out ahead of you, overwhelming all in their path.

name: Rouse the Forest's Fury
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Plant, Primal, Wood
summary: Terrifying trees attack your enemies.

name: The Shattered Mountain Weeps
summary: A massive sphere of rock explodes, unleashing a cataclysm of falling debris and deadly shrapnel.

name: Turn the Wheel of Seasons
summary: The seasons shift rapidly.

name: Usurp the Lunar Reins
summary: The moon has always been connected to the tides, and now you can grasp that connection.

name: Kinetic Pinnacle
summary: No one can match the pace at which elements flow from you.

name: Omnikinesis
summary: You can realign your kinetic gate with a thought.
